answers.answer: New arrivals in Galați can find information on how to manage in a new city and who can help them.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'GALAȚI'.

answers.answer: The Galați County Immigration Service can assist individuals with general inquiries via contact numbers and email, and its office is one of the locations where temporary protection can be registered.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Important contacts Galați County Immigration Service'.

answers.answer: The emergency call number for urgent situations in Galați is 112.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Important contacts Galați County Immigration Service'.

answers.answer: Temporary protection in Galați can be registered at the Regional Center for Procedures and Accommodation of Asylum Seekers Galați or the Immigration Office of Galati County.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Temporary protection in Galați'.

answers.answer: The County Emergency Clinical Hospital "Sf. Apostol Andrei" Galați provides general medical services.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Medical services'.

answers.answer: Children can access emergency medical services by going to the Emergency Clinical Hospital for Children "Sf. Ioan" Galați.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Medical services'.

answers.answer: Project HOPE offers a variety of psychological assistance, with consultations available in Ukrainian, Russian, Romanian, English, and Polish.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Psychological support'.

answers.answer: Organizations providing psychological assistance for refugees from Ukraine include Project HOPE, Positive Progress psychological Solutions, Terre des hommes Foundation, Save the Children, The International Organization for Migration (IOM), Plan International Organization, and Red Cross Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Psychological support'.

answers.answer: Children from Ukraine can be enrolled in state kindergartens and nurseries, private kindergartens like Clever Kids Kindergarten, or attend extracurricular activities organized by the Galati County School Inspectorate at School no. 16.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Education'.

answers.answer: JRS (Jesuit Refugee Service) offers free Romanian language courses in Galați.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Education'.

answers.answer: JRS Romania offers free Romanian language courses along with educational, cultural, recreational, and relaxation activities, while Red Cross Romania provides a variety of mental health consultations and psychological support.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Organisations offering their support'.

answers.answer: AIDRom offers support including social and legal advice, social assistance like vouchers for food and medicine, medical consultations, subsidies for education, labor market access support, and cultural integration.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Organisations offering their support'.

answers.answer: Women can receive support in accessing reproductive health services, navigating the health system, and services dedicated to victims of domestic violence through the Women's Center.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Women's Center'.

answers.answer: Individuals living with HIV can receive free, anonymous, and confidential psycho-medical-social services from specialist doctors at 10 Regional HIV Centers in Romania, with expertise and support from Sens Pozitiv.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/dopomoha-galati and read the section under 'Counseling for people living with HIV'.
